item.description:
This area is a favorite to many. It’s very local, historic, scenic and has an even terrain for all to enjoy.

Let's Meet at Lexington Rd. Meriam’s Corner parking area, which marks the entrance to the Minute Man National Historical Park. Lexington Rd. connects downtown Concord to Rt. 2A. Landmarks on Lexington Rd. include Louisa May Alcott's Orchard House and the Hawthorne Inn.

For a park map use this link:

http://www.nps.gov/mima/planyourvisit/upload/MIMA%20Park%20Map.pdf

Incase you are running late that morning or can't find us, my cell is #508-361-7978.
item.how_to_find_us: Meriam’s Corner parking area near my car, a grey Corolla
item.name: Memorial Day Walk/Hike at Minuteman Historic National Park
